column4: BRIEF-Meritage Homes Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.07
column6: * MERITAGE HOMES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 DILUTED EPS OF $1.07, WITH A 33% INCREASE IN PRETAX EARNINGS ON 10% GROWTH IN HOME CLOSING REVENUE, HIGHER HOME CLOSING GROSS MARGIN AND GREATER OVERHEAD LEVERAGE; STRONG DEMAND FOR ENTRY-LEVEL HOMES HELPS DRIVE 1
column7: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.73 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
